original_text: Obey God, like good children who obey their father. Before you knew the true message about Christ, you very much wanted to do bad things. But now you should not agree to live in that bad way.
korean_text: 너희가 순종하는 자식처럼 전에 알지 못할 때에 따르던 너희 사욕을 본받지 말고

sentences.original_text: Before you knew the true message about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그리스도에 대한 참된 메시지를 알기 전에는

sentences.original_text: you very much wanted to do bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 매우 나쁜 일을 하고 싶어했다

sentences.original_text: you should not agree to live in that bad way
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 나쁜 방식으로 살기에 동의해서는 안 된다
